name: 蒼葉
message: "Sorry..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't sweat it. Why don't we try this instead?"
He crouches down with his back to me.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hop on."

name: 紅雀
message: "I don't got all night."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What..."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'll carry you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Quit your yapping and get on."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You're kidding, right?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm serious, man. Can't get home if you can't walk, right? Hurry it up. Everyone's staring."
I can't really argue with that logic.
Club staff are already working frantically to clean up my mess, and everyone on the dance floor clearly wants us gone as quickly as possible.
Swallowing my pride, I wrap my arms around Koujaku's shoulders and rest my weight on his back.
I'm really too old for this... But I don't want to cause any more trouble.

name: 紅雀
message: "Up we go."
Koujaku hooks his arms beneath my thighs and slowly stands. The sensation startles me at first, so I cling tightly to his neck.
No one's given me a piggyback ride since I was a kid. It's actually kinda scary.

name: 紅雀
message: "Sorry about all that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, I'm sorry..."
Koujaku bows to the staff cleaning up the mess, then carries me out along the edge of the dance floor, where we won't get in anyone's way.
The fresh air feels amazing when we finally get outside. That cramped space was awful, with all those lights and noises and smells.
Koujaku walks on, saying nothing. From time to time, he adjusts his grip on my legs.
After a while, I stop caring about the looks we're getting.
Koujaku's back is warm and comfortable. I'm finally starting to feel better.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Koujaku."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hm?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm sorry. For ruining your kimono."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't sweat it. That's what washing machines are for. We're bros, aren't we?"
His words cut deep. Right now, his kindness hurts.

name: 紅雀
message: "Just be quiet. Don't want you puking again."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Okay."
Koujaku is thinking about me first, like always. He helped me, even though it meant ruining his clothes.
The pain in my chest grows.
He's always been like this, kind and considerate. Maybe that's why he's so popular with women.

I, on the other hand, am still having a hard time shaking my suspicions.

I know I'm just overthinking it, but it drives me crazy to know that he's keeping secrets from me.
There's a part of me, an awful part, that refuses to appreciate his kindness.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Hm?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Nothing."
I'm torn. Should I just grow some balls and ask him about it? Or would it be better to pretend I didn't see anything?
We've known each other for so long, but that just makes it harder.
How close are we, really?
While dwelling on these questions, I feel exhaustion slowly overtake my body.
The rhythm of Koujaku's steps is just... so soothing.
As my eyelids grow heavy, I sink into Koujaku's back.
